mapper.select: select fr.id as friendRequestId, u.id as myFriendId, u.face as myFriendFace, u.nickname as myFriendNickname, fr.verify_message as verifyMessage, fr.request_time as requestTime, fr.verify_status as verifyStatus from friend_request fr left join users u on fr.my_id = u.id where fr.friend_id = #{paramMap.mySelfId} order by fr.request_time desc
